Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The class Controller represents the controller of the Board/Game
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ysabel Bondoc, Jaime Manalo

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller​(BoardGUI gui, Player[] players)
      This constructor initializes the controller
      Parameters:
      gui - initializes the board and gets the data of the board
      players - the data of the players

  • Method Details

    • processClick

      public void processClick​(Piece a, ImageIcon b, int i, int j)
      This method processes your chosen move by moving the image icon and changing the coordinates of your piece
      Parameters:
      a - The piece selected
      b - The icon of the selected piece
      i - the row coordinate the piece moves to
      j - the column coordinate the piece moves to

    • checkMove

      public boolean checkMove​(Piece a, int i, int j)
      This method checks whether a move is valid
      Parameters:
      a - The piece selected
      i - the row coordinate the piece will move to
      j - the column coordinate the piece will move to
      Returns:
      whether the move is valid or not

    • isLionOrTiger

      public boolean isLionOrTiger​(Piece a, int i, int j)
      This method returns whether a tiger or lion can jump over a river
      Parameters:
      a - The piece selected
      i - The row coordinate the piece will move to
      j - the column coordinate the piece will move to
      Returns:
      whether the piece can move or not

    • noMouse

      public boolean noMouse​(ArrayList<Piece> p)
      This method checks whether there is a mouse on the board
      Parameters:
      p - The array list of pieces
      Returns:
      whether there is a mouse or not

    • removePiece

      public void removePiece​(Piece a, int i, int j)
      This method removes a piece from the board
      Parameters:
      a - the piece selected
      i - the row coordinate the piece selected is moving to
      j - the column coordinate the piece selected is moving to

    • getSelectedP

      public Piece getSelectedP​(ArrayList<Piece> a, int x, int y)
      This method gets the piece selected
      Parameters:
      a - The array list of pieces
      x - the row coordinate selected
      y - the column coordinate selected
      Returns:
      the piece selected

    • getSelectedIcon

      public ImageIcon getSelectedIcon​(ArrayList<ImageIcon> a, int x, int y)
      This method gets the piece selected
      Parameters:
      a - The array list of Image Icons
      x - the row coordinate selected
      y - the column coordinate selected
      Returns:
      the icon selected

    • getPiece

      public Piece getPiece​(int x, int y)
      This method gets the piece that is on the coordinate that the selected piece is moving to
      Parameters:
      x - The row coordinate the selected piece is moving to
      y - the column coordinate the selected piece is moving to
      Returns:
      the piece on the coordinate

    • Turns

      public void Turns​(Object source, Controller.movePiece moveP)
      This method adds the action listener movePiece
      Parameters:
      source - the button clicked by the user
      moveP - the action listener movePiece
